nodes.text: Around 27,700 BBY, the Infinite Empire of the Rakata species tried to conquer the planet Korriban, homeworld of the Sith. The Rakata fought with their Force-based technology but the Sith Empire ruled by King Adas, managed to defend themselves and rout the invaders. However King Adas was killed during the battle and his disappearance plunged Korriban into civil war. The Sith later used captured Rakatan starships to leave Korriban and reach other worlds, such as Ziost, Malachor, and Tund.
